basic.name: Sal Carrasco
basic.job: Product Leader - Cloud infrastructure, Storage, Observability & Identity
basic.summary: Pragmatic, vision-driven product leader with 10+ years of experience in building and scaling cloud infrastructure, storage, observability, and identity products. I’ve built my career across environments ranging from fast-moving startups to my current role within a Fortune 500 enterprise (Equinix).

experiences.title: Senior Product Manager
experiences.details: Led various Product Management efforts for the digital services business unit for one of the world's largest data center and infrastructure companies, Equinix, a fortune 500 company. Worked with modern technologies across compute, networking, storage, observability, and identity.

experiences.title: Site Reliability Engineering Manager
experiences.details: Akamai is the world's largest and most trusted edge platform. While at Akamai I Managed a team of SREs responsible for ensuring the reliability and performance of Akamai's cloud infrastructure, storage, and observability products.

experiences.title: Systems Operations Manager
experiences.details: Linode is a cloud hosting provider. Worked on various projects related to compute cloud infrastructure, storage, and observability.

education.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.details: Graduated with a minor in Mathematics and specilized in Programming Languages and Compiler Design.

education.title: Certified Scrum Product Owner® (CSPO®)
education.details: Certified Scrum Product Owner® (CSPO®) from Scrum Alliance, demonstrating expertise in Agile methodologies and product ownership.
